name: document

marginbottom.description:
Specifies the bottom margin in inches (default) or
            centimeters. To specify bottom margin in
            centimeters, include the unit=cm attribute.

useragent.description: Text to put in the HTTP User-Agent request header field. Used to identify the request client software.

filename.description: name for output file, if not defined output will be written to response stream

proxyuser.description: When required by a proxy server, a valid username.

htmlbookmark.description:
if true it is possible to convert to outlines a list of named anchors (label) or a headings structure (

...

). Transforming of HTML hyperlinks to PDF hyperlinks (if not explicitly disabled). Hyperlink jumps within the same document are supported as well

saveasname.description: (format="PDF" only) The filename that appears in the SaveAs dialog when a user saves a PDF file written to the browser.

localurl.description: Specifies whether to retrieve image files directly from the local drive

name.description: name of a variable to store the output in it

authuser.description: User name sent to the target URL for Basic Authentication. Combined with password to form a base64 encoded string that is passed in the Authenticate header. Does not provide support for Integrated Windows, NTLM, or Kerberos authentication.

fontembed.description: define if fonts will embedded with the file

pagetype.description: defined the used format for the page (,legal,letter,A4,A5,B4,B5,B4-JIS,B5-JIS and custom)

encryption.description: define if the output should be encrypted and how deep

src.description: define a url or or a relative path on the local system to a file that should be transferred to a pdf

bookmark.description: Specifies whether bookmarks are created in the document

proxyport.description:
The port number on the proxy server from which the object is requested. Default is 80. When
	used with resolveURL, the URLs of retrieved documents that specify a port number are automatically
	resolved to preserve links in the retrieved document.

backgroundvisible.description: Specifies whether the background prints when the user prints the document

proxypassword.description: When required by a proxy server, a valid password.

marginright.description:
Specifies the right margin in inches (default) or
            centimeters. To specify right margin in centimeters,
            include the unit=cm attribute.

marginleft.description:
Specifies the left margin in inches (default) or
            centimeters. To specify left margin in centimeters,
            include the unit=cm attribute.

authpassword.description: Password sent to the target URL for Basic Authentication. Combined with username to form a base64 encoded string that is passed in the Authenticate header. Does not provide support for Integrated Windows, NTLM, or Kerberos authentication.

scale.description: define a scale factor as a percentage. this option is used to reduce the size of the HTML output so that it fits on that paper. define a number less than 100.

unit.description: set the unit for pageheight, pagewidth, and margin...

overwrite.description: define if a existing file will be overwritten or not

srcfile.description: define a absolute path to a file that should be transferred to a pdf

orientation.description: is the orientation landscape or portrait

margintop.description:
Specifies the top margin in inches (default) or
            centimeters. To specify top margin in centimeters,
            include the unit=cm attribute.

mimetype.description: mimetype of the source (when attribute src or srcfile are defined)

description: Creates a PDF document from a text block containing CFML and HTML.
